name: cybdd
description: Boilerplate for implementing BDD (cucumber) in cypress

scripts.report:allure: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open  allure-report
scripts.cypress:open:dev: cross-env ENV=dev CYPRESS_ALLURE=true npx cypress open
scripts.cypress:run:dev: cross-env ENV=dev CYPRESS_ALLURE=true npx cypress run
scripts.cypress:run:qa: cross-env ENV=qa CYPRESS_ALLURE=true npx cypress run
scripts.cypress:run:prod: cross-env ENV=production CYPRESS_ALLURE=true npx cypress run
scripts.test:dev: npm run cypress:run:dev && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:qa: npm run cypress:run:qa && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:prod: npm run cypress:run:prod && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
